sentence:
…Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize Mr. Ralph O'Dell  of Celina, Texas, and present him with the Congressional Patriot Award.  Ralph has dedicated himself to faithfully serving our community and  country.

Ralph is a veteran of the Second World War and served with the United  States Army from 1943 to 1946. He participated in the South Pacific  campaign,…

…Speaker, I rise today to recognize Dr. Walter Eugene  Hunter of Celina, Texas, and present him with the Congressional Patriot  Award. Walter has dedicated himself to faithfully serving our community  and country.
